name: Fragments (itch) (Lothrinn)
description:
"Fragments" is my very first jam game, as well as the first game I made by watching as few tutorials as possible.

In this game you have to collect light fragments in order to bring life back into a cold, dead world.

Jam theme was  "Light and Darkness".

Controls :

A / Q : Move left

D : Move right

Spacebar : Jump

(You can also use the arrow keys)
